description.raw: I occasionally get `[Errno 104] Connection reset by peer` when trying to upload a tarball with `s3cmd put` during a release.py call. It was just happening to me now with the ign-common2 prerelease. I noticed that [someone recommends](https://www.pimp-my-rig.com/2016/12/s3cmd-errno-104-connection-reset-by-peer.html) using `s3cmd sync` instead of `s3cmd put`, and that fixed their problem. I tried that, and it worked for me.
description.html: I occasionally get [Errno 104] Connection reset by peer when trying to upload a tarball with s3cmd put during a release.py call. It was just happening to me now with the ign-common2 prerelease. I noticed that someone recommends using s3cmd sync instead of s3cmd put, and that fixed their problem. I tried that, and it worked for me.

title.raw: use s3cmd sync instead of s3cmd put to avoid [Errno 104] Connection reset by peer
title.html: use s3cmd sync instead of s3cmd put to avoid [Errno 104] Connection reset by peer
